thread.title: Local News: News anchor Janet Mbugua blasts fan over negative comment about her pregnancy
thread.title_full: Local News: News anchor Janet Mbugua blasts fan over negative comment about her pregnancy

title: Local News: News anchor Janet Mbugua blasts fan over negative comment about her pregnancy
text:
By Wesley Kipng'enoh Wednesday, Oct 14th 2015 at 12:16 Janet Mbugua Photo:IG 
By Wesley Kipng'enoh (@Wess_kipp) 
News anchor Janet Mbugua has shot down her ’haters’ after one of her followers mentioned that her baby bump display on social media was too much. 
A lady commented on a her photo mentioning that her pregnancy was not “for the whole world to see" 
The lady criticized the presenter for emulating Kardashians, a statement that did not go well with Janet. “I don't care for your opinion, you don't have to follow me”, Janet writes, “This is for men and women who celebrate transitions,” 
Some were quick to come to Mbugua’s rescue acknowledging that this was actually a special moment for Mrs Ndichu-Janet. Very very very beautiful congratulations Janet...u've shed a new light to the journey through pregnancy one comment said 
The photo that rumbled her Instagram account with comments 
The conversation on her Instagram goes on and on and on ……….here are comments from the lady and the responses Janet had for her. 
dyshica l This is becoming too much even if we cheered at first.kindly Tell your sponsors to take a break and leave that belly for Ndichu not the whole world See also: Love brewed in a newsroom: Media couple Dennis Okari and Betty Kyallo tie the knot 
officialjanetmbugua I can't be jealous of someone who throws in the word 'sponsor' from nowhere. I'm also not saying you're jealous, you just seem confused. I'd appreciate if you'd unfollow me, not a fan of haters on my timeline. Thanks! 
adyshcal it is good to celebrate but too much of something is poisonous. I wonder why we always fear telling the truth to this celebs at times.@officialjanetmbugua has been most disciplined gal but I don't blame her i blame her sponsors for where she is headed 
ldyshcal Ha ha @annie.ed am not telling her to change but hope she gets my weird observation. She is a lovely gal .we adored her even before.she doesn't have to start emulating the Kardashian 
officialjanetmbugua @ladyshical I don't care for your opinion, you don't have to follow me if you don't like what you see! This is for men and women who celebrate transitions! GO TO PAGE 1 2 Next » SIMILAR STORIES
